mapper.select: select count(*) from ShoppingCart where GoodsId = ${GoodsId} and UId = '${UId}'

SELECT g.GoodsId,g.GoodsInformation,g.GoodsName,g.GoodsPrice,gp.GoodsPictureString,sc.GoodsNum,SC.UId,sc.GoodsNum*g.GoodsPrice AS total FROM goods g INNER JOIN goodspicture gp ON g.GoodsId = gp.GoodsPictureString INNER JOIN shoppingcart sc ON sc.GoodsId = g.GoodsId where sc.UId = 'admin'
mapper.update: update ShoppingCart set GoodsNum = GoodsNum - 1 where GoodsId = ${GoodsId} and UId = '${UId}'
update ShoppingCart set GoodsNum = GoodsNum + 1 where GoodsId = ${GoodsId} and UId = '${UId}'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ShoppingCart where UId = '${UId}' and GoodsId = ${GoodsId}
